title: Summoners War Tier List
description: This tier list is based on the opinions of experienced players and may not reflect everyone's experiences. The metagame is constantly evolving, so this list may not be accurate in the future.
heading: Summoners War Tier List
introText: This tier list is based on the opinions of experienced players and may not reflect everyone's experiences. The metagame is constantly evolving, so this list may not be accurate in the future.

data.itemDescription: Oliver is a must-have for any PvP team. His ability to reset cooldowns can completely disrupt the enemy's strategy
Kaki is a nuker who can deal massive damage to a single target. He is especially effective against teams that rely on a single damage dealer
Arta is a support monster who can provide buffs and debuffs that can turn the tide of battle. He is especially effective in RTA
Savannah is a bruiser who can deal damage and take a hit. She is a great all-around monster who can be used in a variety of teams
Daphnis is a nuker who can deal massive damage to all enemies. He is especially effective against teams that are grouped together
Jeanne is a support monster who can provide shields and immunity. She is a great counter to Oliver
Bolverk is a bruiser who can deal damage and take a hit. He is a great all-around monster who can be used in a variety of teams
Ragdoll is a support monster who can strip buffs and debuffs. He is a great counter to teams that rely on buffs
Triana is a support monster who can provide invincibility. She is a great counter to nukers
Veromos is a support monster who can crowd control the enemy team. He is a great choice for PvE content
Loren is a support monster who can break down the enemy's defense. She is a good choice for teams that rely on nukers
Fran is a support monster who can provide healing and immunity. She is a good choice for PvE content
Maruna is a nuker who can deal damage to all enemies. She is a good choice for teams that need to clear waves quickly
Ganymede is a support monster who can strip buffs and debuffs. He is a good choice for teams that need to control the enemy team
Xing Zhe is a bruiser who can deal damage and take a hit. He is a good all-around monster who can be used in a variety of teams
Bael is a nuker who can deal massive damage to a single target. However, he is very squishy and can be easily killed
Tiana is a support monster who can strip buffs and debuffs. However, she is very unreliable and can often miss her skills
Poseidon is a nuker who can deal damage to all enemies. However, he is very slow and can be easily outsped
Juno is a support monster who can provide immunity. However, she is very niche and is only useful in specific teams
